short_summary: Beaver Creek Institution Perimeter Lights Replacement - Phase 1
description: This solicitation is to evaluate contractors with the experience and capability to perform construction services that involve contractual commitments that require the contractor to perform and achieve results meeting predefined specifications or standards, while providing labor and associated materials necessary for construction. The actual work may require some degree of public awareness and on-site activity.
